name: Accountable
headline: Smarter spending for vacation rental managers
description: Issue employee cards, match properties to charges instantly, sync to your PMS and accounting platform, and close your books faster.

founders.name: Shaan Franchi, Founder
founders.description: Airbnb Superhost (6 Years), ex-Goldman, former head of growth at Clarity Money.

founders.name: Avi Singh, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CTO of Accountable (formerly Hostfi)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a0255778469e5e494d732b_house-icon.svg)
Custom-built for enterprise property managers
# Smarter Spending for Property Managers
Issue employee cards, match properties to charges instantly, sync to your PMS and accounting platform, and close your books 90% faster.
[Get Started](https://accountablevr.com/</get-started>)![Accountable App UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/669947a04c2a5f9ec6ec2f7d_hero-illustration-min.png)![Accountable App UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a24df31572601246989acc_hero-mobile-min.png)
Accountable (Hostfi Inc.) is a financial technology company, not a bank. Accountable Visa® Commercial Credit cards are powered by Stripe and issued by Celtic Bank, Member FDIC, and Cross River Bank, Member FDIC, under a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and may be used everywhere Visa cards are accepted. Accountable partners with Stripe Payments Company for money transmission services and account services with funds held at Fifth Third Bank, Member FDIC, and Evolve Bank & Trust, Member FDIC.
## Save up to hundreds of bookkeeping hours annually
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/669956f81e997efe0123a85a_three-dots-icon.svg)
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/6699578c4cc8180d79e4be44_arrow.svg)
Recapture up to $1,000 annually per property in lost expenses
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/6699578c4cc8180d79e4be44_arrow.svg)
Eliminate duplicate, manual entry accounting errors


Property property managers tell us managing and attributing spending with specific properties is a very manual, frustrating time suck. Some even call it the black hole that eats away at their profits every month.
With Accountable, you eliminate the need to manually reconcile monthly store accounts and credit card statements. No more chasing down receipts. No more double manual entry in your PMS and operating accounting system. And no more approving payments one at a time.
## Our solutions
We offer an all-in-one financial suite for property managers.
### Expense Management
Capture receipts and tag by property at the point of sale with Accountable cards issued by Visa or bring your own cards.
![Accountable Spending System](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/669947a0bade6c655ad2267c_spending-system-illustration-min.png)
### Bill Pay
Send same-day ACH, wires, and mailed checks. Use AI-powered bill pay and custom approval workflows.
![Accountable Payment System](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a3b2991dfcbe9d3ae64dfa_payment-system-illustration.png)
### Operating & Trust Accounts
Unlimited accounts to secure your funds. FDIC-Insurance Eligible accounts that offer interest and custom user permissions.
![Accountable Operating and Trust Accounts](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a3b2da6a9bdc0145f2bf7a_operating-and-trust-accounts.png)
### Dual Acounting
Sync with Property Management and Operating Accounting Systems. Custom-built to save hundreds of bookkeeping hours annually.
![Accountable Dual Accounting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/669947a06105fe63c08b1e5a_dual-accounting-illustration-min.png)
## Hear from Our Customers

"We've saved hundreds of payroll hours since implementing Accountable and now can do our month-end processes with a click of a button. In our first year with them, we’ve reclaimed 30% more owner expenses that we’d been writing off, substantially improving our bottom line. I think we added about $20,000 in profit!"
Heather H., Founding Partner, Cape & Coast Premier PropertiesSt. George Island, FL, 250+ properties‍
![Cape & Coast Premier Properties](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/669eb06553972cfa9a3152b8_cape-coast-logo-white.png)
[![Matt Elliott](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/669947a0a27d6c265270ca35_client-photo-testimonial-min.png)](https://accountablevr.com/<#>)
## Read our case studies and calculate ROI
[![Cape & Coast Properties Case Study](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a9374514c2faafc58eaca6_cape-coast-case-study-min.jpg)](https://accountablevr.com/</case-studies>)
### Reclaim Lost Profits & Save 40+ Hours Monthly
Discover how Cape & Coast recovered $20k in owner expenses. Download our case study to see how Accountable can transform your rental finances.
[Download Case Study](https://accountablevr.com/</case-studies>)[![Savings Calculator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a937452e8742e3c17caba5_savings-calculator-min.png)](https://accountablevr.com/</savings-calculator>)
### Uncover Your Savings Potential with Accountable
Calculate how much time and money you'll save each month by streamlining your rental finances
[Calculate Monthly Savings](https://accountablevr.com/</savings-calculator>)
## Dual Accounting
Sync with Property Management and Operating Accounting Systems. Custom-built to save hundreds of bookkeeping hours annually.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/669956f81e997efe0123a85a_three-dots-icon.svg)
![Dual Accounting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66b3a84752b45b0a7e6da8f1_dual-accounting-big-illustration-min.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a015dca329643d7b2b8b30_feature-1.svg)
### Operating and Trust Accounting Integrations
Dual accounting integrations save hundreds of bookkeeping hours and eliminate double entry errors.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a015dbc499e0576ed803c0_feature-2.svg)
### No Login or App Required
Knowing how to send texts is our only requirement - built with your field staff in mind.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a015db66696f42cef4ad2f_feature-3.svg)
### Full Transaction Visibility
Our dashboard shows you who spent what, when and where, and for which property.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a015dcdaef3041e19416b4_feature-4.svg)
### Real-Time Alerts
Configurable alerts mean you can be instantly notified when any team member spends on their card.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a015db5d5ebffbfcf94a77_feature-5.svg)
### Simplify Your Reporting
A few seconds at point of purchase saves hundreds of hours generating owner, property, and manager statements.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6699389e72a0ec801f17f00d/66a015db5efd6a49c71d02c2_feature-6.svg)
### Pay with One Process
No matter how you pay vendors or owners - debit cards, charge credit cards, ACH, wires, mailed checks - we can handle it.
[Learn how it works](https://accountablevr.com/</expense-management>)
## Save up to hundreds of bookkeeping hours annually

Accountable partners with Stripe Payments Company for money transmission services and account services with funds held at Fifth Third Bank, Member FDIC, and Evolve Bank & Trust, Member FDIC. Accountable Visa® Commercial Credit cards are powered by Stripe and issued by Celtic Bank, Member FDIC, and Cross River Bank, Member FDIC, under a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and may be used everywhere Visa cards are accepted. Your accounts through Accountable (Hostfi Inc.) are eligible for FDIC pass-through deposit insurance if they meet certain requirements. The accounts are eligible only to the extent pass-through insurance is permitted by the rules and regulations of the FDIC, and if the requirements for pass-through insurance are satisfied. The FDIC insurance applies up to $250,000 USD per depositor, per financial institution, for deposits held in the same type of account. Both Accountable (Hostfi Inc.) and our partner Stripe are not FDIC-insured institutions themselves. The FDIC's deposit coverage only protects against the failure of an FDIC-insured depository institution.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Accountable**

Founded in 2022, Accountable is a financial technology startup headquartered in New York, notable for being part of Y Combinator's Batch S22. With a lean team of just two employees, Accountable is making waves in the vacation rental industry by simplifying financial management for property managers.

**Mission Statement: Smarter Spending for Vacation Rental Managers**

Accountable's mission is straightforward yet impactful: to enable vacation rental managers to spend smarter. They start with the pain points property managers face—complicated, manual bookkeeping and expense tracking. Let's face it—if you've ever had to reconcile credit card statements with property expenses, you know it's like herding cats. Accountable aims to eliminate that hassle.

**How It Works**

The core features of Accountable include:

- **Employee Card Issuance:** Issue Visa® commercial credit cards directly, allowing for streamlined spending tracking.
- **Instant Charge Matching:** Automatically match property expenses with the respective charges in real-time, so there's no more guesswork or manual data entry.
- **Seamless Integration:** Syncs easily with your Property Management System (PMS) and other accounting platforms, accelerating your bookkeeping process—think closing your books 90% faster!
- **Dual Accounting:** Custom-built solutions save hundreds of hours of bookkeeping by integrating with both property management and operating accounting systems.

The platform is designed to reduce the endless cycle of chasing down receipts and rectify manual entry errors, making life easier for property managers. 

**Product Offerings**

Accountable offers a full financial suite tailored for property managers:

1. **Expense Management:** Ensure all expenses are categorized accurately at the point of sale.
2. **Bill Pay:** Handle vendor payments through ACH, wire transfers, and check mailings effortlessly.
3. **Operating & Trust Accounts:** Manage unlimited accounts with FDIC-eligible security, and enjoy unique user permissions.
4. **Robust Reporting Tools:** Generate insights into spending with clarity and ease, reducing the time spent on reporting.

**What Customers Are Saying**

The feedback from users paints a promising picture. Heather H., a founding partner at Cape & Coast Premier Properties, states, “We’ve saved hundreds of payroll hours since implementing Accountable…we reclaimed 30% more owner expenses that we’d been writing off, substantially improving our bottom line.”

**Why Choose Accountable?**

If you're in the business of managing vacation rentals, Accountable is a breath of fresh air in the often murky waters of financial management. They leverage modern technology to eliminate tedious processes and uncover potential savings. In a nutshell, they're transforming how property managers handle their finances—streamlined, efficient, and stress-free.

**Learn More**

To see how Accountable can streamline your accounting processes and reclaim lost profits, visit their website [here](https://accountablevr.com). 

In a volatile market, having a partner like Accountable could make all the difference—because smarter spending is the way to thrive.
